Can someone give me an opinion on this tsuba? The description states it
is a "Early edo period (circa 1650) tetsu (iron) tsuba for katana, maru
gata, (round shaped), ko-nara school, ("old" Nara)".

http://www.angelfire.com/darkside/necromage/images/konaramaru1.jpg
http://www.angelfire.com/darkside/necromage/images/konaramaru2.jpg
